text: Vyprobovuyte syrit, poky vony ne dosyahnutʹ shlyubnoho viku. I koly pobachyte vy u nykh zdorovyy hluzd, to povernitʹ yim yikhnye mayno. Ne pozhyrayte yoho, zaymayuchysʹ marnotrat·stvom ta pospishayuchy, [boyachysʹ] toho chasu, koly vony podoroslishayutʹ. Bahatyy nekhay utrymayetʹsya, a bidnyy nekhay spozhyvaye z·hidno zi zvychayem. I koly vy povernete yim mayno yikhnye, to poklychte dlya tsʹoho svidkiv. Dostatnʹo toho, yak rakhuye Allah
